text: This is the military invasions to take place during the 21st century. *2024 invasion of Babanusa *2023 invasion of the Gaza Strip *2023 Afghanistan invasion of Iran *2023 invasion of Buulo Mareer *2023 invasion of Sudan *2022 invasion of Yangtse *2022 invasion of Runirgod District *2022 invasion of Balad, Somalia *2022 invasion of Kyrgyzstan *2022 invasion of Armenia *2022 invasion of Ukraine *2022 invasion of Bambui, Cameroon *2022 al-Shabaab invasion of Ethiopia *2022 invasion of Moura, Mali *2021 invasion of Afghanistan *2021 invasion of Aguililla *2019 invasion of Syria *2018 invasion of Socotra *2018 invasion of Syria *2017 invasion of the Gambia *2016 invasion of Syria *2014 invasion of Gaza *2014 invasion of Ukraine *2011 invasion of Somalia *2008 invasion of Gaza *2008 invasion of Georgia *2008 invasion of Anjouan *2006 invasion of Somalia *2006 invasion of Lebanon *2006 Hezbollah invasion of Israel *2005 invasion of Al-Qurnah, Iraq *2004 invasion of Gaza *2003 invasion of Iraq *2002 invasion of West Bank *2001 invasion of Afghanistan Category:Conflicts Category:21st century
title: List of invasions in the 21st century
